summary: Replaced Archmage\'s Robes with hoodless Psijic Robes.
descriptionHtml:
Think the Archmage\'s Robes pale in comparison to the Psijic Robes?  Want the best of both worlds? 

DESCRIPTION
============
Replaces the default Archmage\'s Robes with hoodless Psijic Robes.  The enchantment is retained, the only difference is appearance.  Any changes to the Psijic Robes such as HD texture replacements should work with this.

Note that because there is no hood this should work fine with the dragon priest masks.

If you\'d prefer the hooded version of the Psijic Robes it\'s already been done by SanCo88:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1228

If you\'d like different textures just search Skyrim Nexus for \"Psi\".  There are three posted right now:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=458
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=435
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1529

If you want matching gloves and boots either find a mod that adds crafting recipes for them or use the console (~):
player.additem 65B9B
player.additem 65B9D

INSTALLATION
=============
1. Drop into your Skyrim/Data folder.
2. Select the ESP under \"Data Files\" in the Skyrim launcher.
3. Play the game.

UNINSTALLATION
================
Delete or uncheck the ESP.

KNOWN ISSUES
==============
The description on the robe is no longer localized and does not have bold numbers.
author: kab
